doc.title: Liegui Aisha
doc.plot: Aisha, a girl of a mystical civilization and her cloaked reptilian partner/protector/friend, Philostedes, trying to learn more about their civilization and the links between Planet Earth, and their own origin worlds of mysterious origin. A naive and submissive college student and researcher named Lieng Yan is curious about Aisha, Philostedes and the links between our world and other worlds. He later learns that Aisha's purpose in life is to bring peace to both divine spirits and living beings and banish troubled spirits and destroy the wicked God King Iblis. So Aisha, her partner Philostedes and the hapless Lieng Yan must find the whereabout of mysterious civilzations of other worlds and protecting the spirit and god-beings from King Iblis and other creations, even if it means going around different worlds and places on earth to do so.
